name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Shell Access Incident
description: This playbook details the actions taken to mitigate an unauthorized user executing scripts and deploying a backdoor on multiple hosts via remote command execution.

parallel--0de3c7f7-d9b6-4c99-9c47-d74d7c.name: Reduce Threat Impact
parallel--0de3c7f7-d9b6-4c99-9c47-d74d7c.description: Execute multiple actions to mitigate the threat from unauthorized access.

action--bc6f4673-a1a9-4a8b-b56e-f84955de.name: Kill malicious processes
action--bc6f4673-a1a9-4a8b-b56e-f84955de.description: Terminate any processes running malicious scripts.

action--f31e7f6c-f5b8-400f-9762-2868069d.name: Remove backdoor from startup items
action--f31e7f6c-f5b8-400f-9762-2868069d.description: Delete the backdoor script from startup to prevent re-exploitation.

action--ddd3e3b9-8c79-42f7-b09e-6354579e.name: Conduct full system scan
action--ddd3e3b9-8c79-42f7-b09e-6354579e.description: Perform a complete system scan to ensure all threats are removed.

while-condition--c733135f-13a6-4e00-8e43.name: Antivirus Status Check Loop
while-condition--c733135f-13a6-4e00-8e43.description: Continue scanning until the system is clean.

action--b24a8ed7-d9c6-4e82-a8d8-bb8463ee.name: Monitor network traffic for suspicious activity
action--b24a8ed7-d9c6-4e82-a8d8-bb8463ee.description: Capture network traffic to analyze for potential further attacks.

action--c96c6498-2bcf-40de-a529-e5b8e5a2.name: Apply security patches
action--c96c6498-2bcf-40de-a529-e5b8e5a2.description: Update the system and apply security patches.
